TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNameRegistration extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNameRegistration Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type PeerNameRegistration = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 在一个 或一组群中注册 。

span.span: Registers a in a or set of clouds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册将创建 (或更新) 与对等云和云中的关联的所有信息。Registration creates (or updates) all the information that is associated with a in a peer cloud or clouds. 可能有多个对象具有相同的对等名称。It is possible to have multiple objects for the same peer name. 在这种情况下, 如果对等名称是安全的, 则每个实例表示在不同的云中。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance represents in a different cloud. 但是, 如果对等名称是不安全的, 则可以多次在同一云中注册, 同时提供每个注册来自不同的进程。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times, providing that each registration is from a different process.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回类型为的新默认实例。Returns a new default instance of type . 它不在构造过程中执行对等名称注册。It does not perform peer name registration during construction. 使用此构造函数实例化对象后, 调用方应在调用或之前填充该实例中的相应字段。After instantiating an object with this constructor, the caller should populate the appropriate fields in the instance prior to calling or .

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和端口号初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数将创建一个实例, 该实例将用于为对等方当前参与的所有云注册所有源地址 (IPv6and IPv4) 和提供的端口。Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6and IPv4) and the provided port for all clouds in which the peer is currently participating. 如果成功构造对象, 则将填充指定的和。If the object is constructed successfully, the specified and are populated. 如果对等名称是安全的, 并且之前已在对等方中注册 , 则会引发。If the peer name is secured and was previously registered in a the peer is currently participating in, an is thrown. 此构造函数仅创建实例; 它不执行注册。This constructor only creates a instance; it does not perform the registration. 在用此构造函数实例化注册对象并填充其字段之后, 应用程序必须调用以执行实际的注册。After instantiating the registration object with this constructor and populating its fields, the application must call to perform the actual registration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数将创建一个实例, 该实例将用于注册所有源地址 (IPv6 和 IPv4)、提供的端口和指定的。Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6 and IPv4), the provided port, and the specified . 如果成功构造对象, 则将用指定 的和填充属性。If the object is constructed successfully, the properties are populated with the specified , and . `null`如果 cloud 参数为, 则使用快捷方式注册该名称, 这将初始化、 和的默认值。If the cloud parameter is `null`, the name is registered using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and . 在实例化后 , 必须调用方法来注册。After instantiation, the method must be called to register the .

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对等机离开时, 云不再需要与该对等方关联的对象。When a peer leaves a , the cloud no longer requires the object associated with the peer. 注册对象是已停止还是已释放取决于云中是否会重复使用对象来注册此对等方或其他对等方。Whether the registration object is stopped or disposed is dependent upon whether the cloud will reuse the object to register this peer or another peer. 如果要与对等主机通信的注册对象中有其他任何终结点, 则必须在停止或释放此对象之前, 在云中注册这些终结点。If there are any other endpoint(s) within the registration object with which the peer host expected to communicate, registering those endpoints within the cloud must occur before stopping or disposing of this object. 如果云需要注册更多对等方, 则建议使用方法; 当云不再需要内存时, 应通过方法将其返回到操作系统。If the cloud expects to register more peers, the method is recommended; when the cloud no longer needs the memory, it should be returned to the operating system via the method.

summary.span: 获取为其注册关联对等名称的网络终结点的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含为其注册关联对等名称的网络终结点。

span.span: An object that contains the network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在命名空间中, 将网络终结点表示为 IP 地址和端口号。 In the namespace, an represents a network endpoint as an IP address and a port number. 对于 PNRP, 必须为每个终结点提供 IP 地址和端口值。For PNRP, an IP address and port value must be provided for each endpoint. 最多可提供10个终结点。The maximum number of endpoints that can be provided is ten. 如果此参数为`null`, 则使用自动地址选择。Automatic address selection is used when this parameter is `null`. 如果使用注册方法自动选择要注册的地址, 则没有方法来确定对其注册对等名称的地址。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine the addresses for which the peer name was registered. 也就是说, 将不会更新属性以反映所选的地址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 为多个节点注册对等名称时, 每个节点都是不同的, 并且在每个注册实例上定义的属性将有所不同。When a peer name is registered for more than one node, each is distinct and the property defined on each registration instance will be different. 此外, 当注册到多个时, 每个注册都是不同的, 并且对于每个实例, 终结点的集合通常是不同的。Also, when a is registered into more than one , each registration is distinct and the collection of endpoints will usually be different for each instance.

para.span: 此对等方将与之通信的终结点的列表与此对等名称已知的终结点列表不同, 以不同的方式存储。

span.span: The list of endpoints with which this peer will communicate is not the same as the list of endpoints by which this peer name is known, which is stored differently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可为多个节点注册对等名称;每个实例都是不同的。A peer name can be registered for more than one node; each instance is distinct. 与每个对应的实例关联的属性不同。The property associated with each corresponding instance is different. 此外, 还可以为节点连接到的多个云注册对等名称;其中每个注册都是不同的。Also, it is possible to register a peer name for more than one cloud that the node is connected to; each of these registrations is distinct. 每个实例中的对等名称将不同。The peer name's will be different in each of these instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将在属性中指定的对等名称注册到构造函数中的所有源地址和指定的。The method registers the peer name specified in the property with all source addresses and the specified in the constructor. 仅当未指定终结点时, 此方法才使用默认端口。The default port is used by this method only when no endpoints are specified. 如果属性为`null`, 则此方法使用字段注册在属性中指定的对等名称, 这将初始化、和的默认值。 .If the property is `null`, this method registers the peer name specified in the property using the field, which initializes default values for the , , and . 对象启动后 , 使用方法将其停止。 After a object has been started, the method is used to stop it. 若要更新注册, 必须使用方法。To update a registration, the method must be used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 , 并将其注册到指定的元数据。The following code example creates a and registers it along with the metadata specified. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName/CS/RegisterPeerName.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 从对等名称注册的所有云中注销 属性中指定的对等名称。

span.span: Unregisters the peer name specified in the property from all the clouds in which it was registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册过程停止后, 注册对象的状态将与该状态在由无参数构造函数构造后直接相等。After the registration process has been stopped, the registration object's state is equal to the state directly after being constructed by the parameterless constructor. 在此状态下, 其所有属性都假设没有值。In this state, all of its properties are assumed to have no value. 此方法可用于重新启动它。The method may be used to restart it. 同一对等名称可以具有多个注册对象。It is possible to have multiple registration objects for the same peer name. 在这种情况下, 如果对等名称是安全的, 则每个实例将表示在不同的 PNRP 云中的注册。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance will represent a registration in a different PNRP cloud. 但是, 如果对等名称是不安全的, 则可以多次在同一云中注册它。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times. 如果此实例已停止, 则调用此方法不起作用。If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.

exception.span: 尚未注册 属性。

span.span: The property has not yet been registered.

exception.span: 使用空构造函数构造 对象时会出现此种情况。

span.span: This occurs when a object is constructed using the empty constructor.

exception.span: 调用 前必须在此实例中填充 属性。

span.span: The property must be populated in this instance prior to calling .

exception.span: 此对象此前让 Dispose() 对其进行调用。

span.span: This object had Dispose() called on it previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用之前, 在云中注册的所有信息都将被完全丢弃。All information registered in cloud(s) for this prior to the call is completely discarded. 新数据不与现有注册结合。The new data is not combined with the existing registration. 若要更新, 请先更新此实例上的属性, 然后调用此方法。To update a , first update the properties on this instance and then call this method. 注册后, 无法更新属性 。After a is registered, the property cannot be updated. 记录中的所有其他字段可能会更新。All other fields in the record may be updated.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseAutoEndPointSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseAutoEndPointSelection : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当遍历对等网格或 时是否使用自动终结点选择。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use automatic endpoint selection when traversing a peer mesh or .

value.span: 如果使用自动终结点选择，则为 ；如果使用其他某个方法来确定终结点，则为 。

span.span: if automatic endpoint selection is to be used; if some other method will be used to determine an endpoint.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用自动终结点选择 (此属性设置为`true`) 时, 如果没有在开始之前指定任何终结点信息, 系统会选择各个终结点, 并将关联的对等名称发布到所有可用的云彩.When auto endpoint selection is used (this property is set to `true`) with no endpoint information specified prior to the start of a , the system chooses individual endpoints and publishes them with the associated peer name into all available clouds. 如果未指定端口, 则自动选择将选择零作为。If the port is not specified, auto selection chooses zero as the . 如果设置为`false`, 则不执行上述自动选择。When set to `false`, auto selection as described above is not performed. 这使注册过程可以发布对等名称和数据 blob (由属性指定)。This enables the registration process to publish a peer name along with a data blob (as specified by the property). 没有与该名称关联的终结点。No endpoints are associated with the name. 如果使用注册方法自动选择要注册的地址, 则没有方法来确定为其注册对象的地址。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine what addresses for which the object was registered. 也就是说, 将不会更新属性以反映所选的地址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 在开始对等名称注册后更新此属性不起作用。Updating this property after peer name registration has started has no effect.
